thread.section_title: The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great services!
thread.title_full: Great services! - Review of The Beekman, A Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NYCSLT
title: Great services!
text:
We are residence of NYU and we enjoyed our staying at the Beekman Hotel celebrating a special occasion.
Designed in the Queen Anne, Neo-Greco, and Renaissance Revival styles in 1883, this historic building is landmarked building--the lay out the interior is very grand with it's sky-lighted atrium and it takes you back to a different era once you step inside.
The facility at the hotel are new and comfortable, matched with great customer service delivered by the team of staff who genuinely want to make sure that you are having a good time staying at this hotel.
I highly recommend the signature cocktails at the bar, and the food at the restaurant are delicious.
For someone who is looking for a place to stay in a beautifully renovated historic building with excellent service on the "Newspaper Row", the Beekman Hotel is definitely a great choice.
